Html:
Hi new to the forum as we are considering OopFactory within our application stack. We host on Azure. Any known issues that would prevent us from deploying the parser there?

Thanks in advance!

I never came across any code that would make me tell you to beware for Azure. That being said the beauty of Azure is spinning up a virtual machine and testing it in a matter of minutes.. Even the database functionality should run fine on Azure assuming SQL access is setup etc.
